ci_support_linux_64_.yaml:
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
python_min:
- '3.10'

about.description:
GaitSetPy is a Python package for gait analysis and recognition. It provides
clean, modern APIs to preprocess, analyze, extract features, classify, and
visualize gait data across multiple datasets and modalities including IMU
sensor-based datasets (Daphnet, HAR-UP, UrFall, MobiFall, Arduous) and
pressure/force sensor-based datasets (PhysioNet).
about.summary: A Python package for gait analysis using sensor data.

about.description:
GaitSetPy is a Python package for gait analysis and recognition. It provides
clean, modern APIs to preprocess, analyze, extract features, classify, and
visualize gait data across multiple datasets and modalities including IMU
sensor-based datasets (Daphnet, HAR-UP, UrFall, MobiFall, Arduous) and
pressure/force sensor-based datasets (PhysioNet).
about.summary: A Python package for gait analysis using sensor data.

name: gaitsetpy
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set name = "gaitsetpy" %}
{% set version = "0.2.4" %}

package:
  name: {{ name|lower }}
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  url: https://pypi.org/packages/source/{{ name[0] }}/{{ name }}/gaitsetpy-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 2df10132a2fa3abcef0176d8f3761d38e27c829dece831cb4f6aee493375b846

build:
  noarch: python
  script: {{ PYTHON }} -m pip install . -vv --no-deps --no-build-isolation
  number: 0

requirements:
  host:
    - python {{ python_min }}
    - setuptools >=45
    - wheel
    - setuptools-scm >=6.2
    - pip
  run:
    - python >={{ python_min }}
    - numpy
    - pandas
    - scipy
    - requests
    - statsmodels
    - matplotlib-base
    - scikit-learn
    - joblib
    - tqdm

test:
  imports:
    - gaitsetpy
  commands:
    - pip check
  requires:
    - python {{ python_min }}
    - pip

about:
  home: https://github.com/Alohomora-Labs/gaitSetPy
  summary: A Python package for gait analysis using sensor data.
  description: |
    GaitSetPy is a Python package for gait analysis and recognition. It provides 
    clean, modern APIs to preprocess, analyze, extract features, classify, and 
    visualize gait data across multiple datasets and modalities including IMU 
    sensor-based datasets (Daphnet, HAR-UP, UrFall, MobiFall, Arduous) and 
    pressure/force sensor-based datasets (PhysioNet).
  license: GPL-3.0-only
  license_file: LICENSE
  doc_url: https://alohomora-labs.github.io/gaitSetPy/gaitsetpy.html
  dev_url: https://github.com/Alohomora-Labs/gaitSetPy

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - aharshit123456
